name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-total-since
title: Total Since
description: Displays total points accumulated within a specified time range (from and until dates).

from.description: The starting date for adding up points. Can be a UNIX timestamp, formatted date, or 'today'.

until.description: The end date for adding up points. Can be a UNIX timestamp, formatted date, or 'now'.

type.description: The point type to sum up.

ref.description: A specific reference to filter the results.

user_id.description: The user ID to add up points for. Use 'current' for the logged-in user.

formatted.description: Whether to show results with a formatted prefix/suffix or in plain format.
